Body:
"""Test return fields are used and formatted correctly in GB API call."""
res = game_client.fetch(1, ['id', 'name'])
assert isinstance(res, Response)
mock_requests_get.assert_called_once_with('http://www.giantbomb.com/api/game/1'
    , params={'field_list': 'id,name', 'api_key': 'fake_key', 'format':
    'json'}, headers={'User-Agent': 'Pybomb {}'.format(version)})
